nio/Join.description: The Join block will group a list of incoming signals into one outgoing signal. The outgoing signal will contain an attribute for each evaluated `key` and the `value` of the key will be a **list** of each value with a matching key.

enrich.title: Signal Enrichment
enrich.description: If checked (true), the attributes of the incoming signal will be excluded from the outgoing signal. If unchecked (false), the attributes of the incoming signal will be included in the outgoing signal.

group_attr.title: Group Attribute Name
group_attr.description: A hidden property. When `group_by` is used, the attibute name 'group' assigned by the `group_by` mixin will be replaced by this property. The default value is `group`.

group_by.title: Group By
group_by.description: The signal attribute of the incoming signal whose values will be used to define groups on the outgoing signal.

key.title: Key
key.description: Evaluates to a key attribute on the outgoing signal.

one_value.title: One Value Per Key
one_value.description: If true, each attribute on the outgoing signal has a value that is a single item instead of a list of all matching values.

value.title: Value
value.description: Evaluates to a value in a list of values with a matching key.

default.description: One outgoing signal that has an attribute for each `key` and the value of that `key` is a **list** of each value from a matching key found on in the incoming signal.
